articles.description: Europe’s BepiColombo space probe, on its way to Mercury, made a significant discovery during its flyby of Venus, revealing the escape of gases like carbon and oxygen from the planet’s atmosphere.
articles.content: As BepiColombo continues its journey towards Mercury, other missions, including Europes Envision spacecraft and NASAs DAVINCI and VERITAS missions, are scheduled to explore Venus in the coming decade.
